pr_title: Add a 'format' script (spotless & trim trailing md space)

timeline.bodyText: Use -print0/-0 or -exec + to allow for non-alphanumeric filenames.
timeline.author: codeclimate
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,7 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+./gradlew spotlessApply
+
+# Trim trailing spaces in .md files
+find . -name "*.md" -type f  | xargs sed -i 's/ *$//'

timeline.message: Furn format script, trim trailing whitespace on .md files

Add a 'format' script to apply automatic formatting

- Runs 'gradlew spotlessApply' to do java formatting
- Trims trailing whitespace on '.md' files
Furn format script, trim trailing whitespace on .md files
